attributes.action: Leave the ECHR and repeal the 2010 Equality Act
attributes.additional_details: The government must ensure that the elected British parliament is responsible and answerable for  all aspects and actions of the government of the UK
attributes.background: Restore parliamentary sovereignty in regard to all legal matters, including international law.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Leave the European Convention on Human Rights (ECHR)
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729027
